original_title: Apink 3rd Japan Tour ~3years~ At Pacifico Yokohama
overview: Apink celebrated the group's third year of Japan activities with their 3rd Live Tour 2017 ~3 years~! The K-pop idols held concerts at three venues in the summer of 2017, and this live release records their show at the Pacifico Yokohama National Convention Hall on July 30.
title: Apink 3rd Japan Tour ~3years~ At Pacifico Yokohama
